ResearchProjectDef.label: Animal prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adapt the designs of human prosthetics for universal animal use. Animal prostheses are cheaper to build than their human counterparts, but also perform a tiny bit worse.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Animal bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adapt the designs of human bionics for universal animal use. Animal bionics are cheaper to build than their human counterparts, but also perform a tiny bit worse.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Animal toxin filtration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Adapt the designs of human bionics organs that can filter out toxins for universal animal use. Animal bionics are cheaper to build than their human counterparts, but also perform a tiny bit worse.
